programs.name: aws Preseed – Innovative Solutions
eligibility: Natural persons (teams) or companies ≤6 months after registration
High degree of innovation with scalable market potential
Focus areas include e.g. diversity, environment/climate, health/care, education, mobility, urban development (as per programme page)
key_exclusions: Deep-tech projects (apply to aws Preseed/Seedfinancing – Deep Tech instead)
Projects at state of the art / incremental changes
Real estate, vehicles, non-specific building equipment
docs_checklist: Follow programme document & templates (see Downloads on programme page)

overlays.ask_if: answers.q1_country in ['AT','EU'] and answers.q2_entity_stage in ['PRE_COMPANY','INC_LT_6M'] and 'INNOVATION_DIGITAL' in answers.q4_theme and answers.q9_team_diversity == 'YES'
overlays.question: Will the project be executed in Austria, is the company ≤6 months old, focuses on digital innovation, AND has women owning >25% of shares?
overlays.rationale: Programme requires Austrian project location, early-stage company, digital innovation focus, AND mandatory gender diversity.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award? (REQUIRED for eligibility)
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is now MANDATORY for eligibility - no longer optional bonus.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding (no repayment required)?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

programs.name: FFG Basisprogramm 2025
eligibility: All company sizes incl. startups in Austria
Projects of experimental development with exploitation potential
key_exclusions: Undertakings in difficulty (financial viability check applies)

thresholds.funding_rate: typically 50% (up to 70% for startups per page)
thresholds.instrument_mix: grant + low-interest loan; possible guarantees for bank credit

deadlines.submission: Ongoing; decisions in scheduled boards (e.g., sessions in 2025)

docs_checklist: Submit via FFG eCall; follow Ausschreibungsleitfaden and Instrumentenleitfaden

overlays.question: Does your project qualify as experimental development and can you document eligible costs in Austria?
overlays.rationale: Basisprogramm funds experimental development; cost eligibility and financial viability checks apply.

overlays.question: Will you include Austrian research partners (university/FH/institute) in a cooperative setup?
overlays.rationale: Cooperations are optional but may be bonified.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award? (REQUIRED for eligibility)
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is now MANDATORY for eligibility - no longer optional bonus.

overlays.ask_if: answers.q8_funding_types and ('GRANT' in answers.q8_funding_types or 'LOAN' in answers.q8_funding_types)
overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding or low-interest loans?
overlays.rationale: Program provides mixed funding: grants + low-interest loans with possible guarantees.

overlays.question: Will you validate user needs and test solution impact iteratively (design thinking / prototypes)?
overlays.rationale: Programme emphasises user-centred validation and impact.

overlays.question: Is your maturity at PoC/Prototype where iterative testing with users is feasible?
overlays.rationale: Programme favours practical experimentation.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for your innovation project?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your company stage and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company stages but may have different requirements.

overlays.question: What is your company size (number of employees)?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company sizes but may have different requirements.

programs.name: Umweltförderung im Betrieb (generic categories)
eligibility: Companies and business operations in Austria (incl. contracting companies; specific public/NGO entities under conditions)
Investments must lead to verifiable environmental effects (e.g., energy efficiency, emission reduction)
key_exclusions: Installations already funded via Ökostrom or EAG
Measures in objects used exclusively for residential purposes

thresholds.funding_rate: per measure; possible EMAS bonus up to 5% (max EUR 10,000)
thresholds.instrument: investment grants; payout after approved final report

deadlines.submission: Ongoing by measure; see respective infosheets

docs_checklist: Use official infosheets per measure; follow calculation rules; final report for payout

overlays.question: Does the investment occur in Austria and does it deliver quantifiable environmental benefits (e.g., kWh saved, tCO₂e avoided)?
overlays.rationale: Eligibility hinges on Austrian investment and demonstrable environmental impact.

overlays.question: Are you EMAS-registered (potential bonus on funding rate)?
overlays.rationale: EMAS bonus can increase the grant within limits.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for environmental investments?
overlays.rationale: Program provides investment grants only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your company stage and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company stages but may have different requirements.

programs.name: LIFE Programme 2025 (selected strands)
eligibility: Legal entities in EU Member States (and associated countries)
Projects addressing LIFE topics (environment, climate, nature)
docs_checklist: Apply via EU Funding & Tenders Portal; follow topic templates

overlays.question: Is your project aligned with a 2025 LIFE topic and ready to apply by the relevant deadline?
overlays.rationale: Multiple strands with fixed deadlines; alignment and timing are decisive.

overlays.question: Is your consortium (if required) fully EU-based/associated and eligible on the chosen LIFE topic?
overlays.rationale: Participation restricted to EU/associated entities; topic-specific eligibility applies.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for environmental/climate projects?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your organization type and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various organization types but may have different requirements.

overlays.question: What is your organization size (number of employees)?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various organization sizes but may have different requirements.

programs.name: Clean Hydrogen Joint Undertaking – Call 2025
key_exclusions: Ineligible third countries (per HE General Annexes)

thresholds.topics: 19 topics; incl. Hydrogen Valleys (€80m from REPowerEU)

docs_checklist: Submit via Funding & Tenders; topic templates; lump-sum grants

overlays.question: Does your project fit a 2025 Clean Hydrogen topic and meet consortium requirements?
overlays.rationale: Topic fit and HE eligibility are mandatory.

overlays.question: Can you quantify GHG benefits and system impacts required by the topic?
overlays.rationale: Impact quantification strengthens proposals.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for hydrogen projects?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Consortium collaboration is mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your organization type and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various organization types but may have different requirements.

overlays.question: What is your organization size (number of employees)?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various organization sizes but may have different requirements.

programs.name: EIC Accelerator 2025
eligibility: Single SME (or small mid-cap under certain conditions)
Breakthrough/high-risk innovations with strong market potential

thresholds.budget: ≥ €1.2–1.4bn total WP 2025 across EIC, Accelerator cut-offs per WP
thresholds.blended_finance: grant + equity possible; topic streams per Work Programme

deadlines.status: See EIC Work Programme 2025 for cut-off dates (various)

docs_checklist: Apply via Funding & Tenders; follow WP 2025 templates; pitching/interview for selected proposals

overlays.ask_if: 'INNOVATION_DIGITAL' in answers.q4_theme and answers.q5_maturity_trl in ['TRL_5_6','TRL_7_8','TRL_9'] and answers.q3_company_size in ['MICRO_0_9','SMALL_10_49','MEDIUM_50_249']
overlays.question: Are you an EU SME with a breakthrough, high-risk innovation at TRL≥5 and willing to seek blended finance?
overlays.rationale: EIC Accelerator targets EU SMEs with TRL≥5 innovations; blended finance is common.

overlays.ask_if: answers.q8_funding_types and ('EQUITY' in answers.q8_funding_types or 'GRANT' in answers.q8_funding_types)
overlays.question: If invited, are you ready for a pitch/interview with EIC jury (slides, financials, traction)?
overlays.rationale: Process includes interview stage.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your company stage and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company stages but may have different requirements.

programs.name: EIT Health – Transformative Health Instrument (THI) 2025
eligibility: Single-beneficiary call aimed at SMEs; non-members can apply (per FAQ)

thresholds.duration: work in 2025; specifics per call documentation

deadlines.status: See call/FAQ; 2025 timelines defined in documents

docs_checklist: Follow EIT Health call document & FAQs; eligibility and timelines inside

overlays.question: Are you an SME with a patient-centred health innovation and can you deliver within 2025 timelines?
overlays.rationale: THI is SME-focused with strict 2025 delivery timelines.

overlays.question: Does your project clearly address health outcomes (not climate-only benefits)?
overlays.rationale: Ensures correct routing to health-focused calls.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for health innovation projects?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your company stage and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company stages but may have different requirements.

overlays.question: What is your company size (number of employees)?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company sizes but may have different requirements.

programs.name: ESA BIC Austria (incubation grant)
eligibility: Entrepreneurs, startups and SMEs with space-enabled products/services (e.g., GNSS, Earth observation)

deadlines.status: Next application deadline to be announced in 2025

docs_checklist: Follow ESA BIC Austria application guidance on site; includes business plan & technical plan

overlays.question: Is your product/service space-enabled (e.g., GNSS/EO data) and are you ready for incubation in Austria?
overlays.rationale: ESA BIC targets space-enabled ventures; €50k grant + incubation.

overlays.question: Can you commit to 24 months incubation milestones and ESA branding requirements?
overlays.rationale: Programme includes business support and milestone obligations.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for space technology projects?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Collaboration is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your company size (number of employees)?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various company sizes but may have different requirements.

programs.name: Horizon Europe – Cluster 1: Health (2025)
eligibility: Consortia eligibility per Horizon Europe (EU/associated), topic-specific conditions apply

thresholds.funding_rate: up to 100% for RIA/CSA; IA typically 70% (non-profit 100%)

deadlines.status: Deadlines vary by topic; see Work Programme 2025

docs_checklist: Apply via Funding & Tenders; follow WP 2025 Part 4 Health; use topic templates

overlays.question: Do you have/plan an eligible EU consortium matching a 2025 Health topic (RIA/IA/CSA)?
overlays.rationale: HE requires eligible consortia and topic fit.

overlays.question: Will your proposal meet evaluation thresholds (≥3/5 per criterion and ≥10/15 overall)?
overlays.rationale: Typical HE thresholds for RIA/IA; ensure strong Excellence/Impact/Implementation.

overlays.question: Are you open to grant funding for health research projects?
overlays.rationale: Program provides grant funding only - no loans or equity.

overlays.question: Are you open to collaborating with research institutions or other companies?
overlays.rationale: Consortium collaboration is mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: Will women own >25% of shares at grant award?
overlays.rationale: Gender diversity is encouraged but not mandatory for this program.

overlays.question: What is your organization type and legal setup?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various organization types but may have different requirements.

overlays.question: What is your organization size (number of employees)?
overlays.rationale: Program is open to various organization sizes but may have different requirements.
